title: Help Ahmad Rebuild His Life
name: Ahmad Hassan
bio: Ahmad is a 34-year-old father of three who fled Syria with his family. He's now working to rebuild their lives and provide education for his children.

title: Mental Health Support for Sarah
name: Sarah M.
bio: Sarah is seeking therapy and treatment for anxiety and depression. Your support helps her access the mental health care she needs.

title: Emergency Aid for Displaced Family
name: Anonymous
bio: A family displaced by conflict needs immediate assistance for shelter, food, and basic necessities.
